mapper.sql: select u.id, u.nickname, u.name, u.phone, u.wx_open_id, u.wx_avatar, u.role, u.position_longitude, u.position_latitude, u.position, u.direct_income, u.team_income, u.withdrawals, u.promo_code, u.team_header_level, u.leader_id, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.deleted from t_user as u where u.deleted != 1
